original: Bokelund, Nils Albert Julius, fd. läroverksadjunkt, Göteborg, f. 20/3/67 i Hälsingborg av bagarm. Aug. B. o. Amalia Nilsson. G. 92 m. A’lma Olsson. — Studiex. 85, fil. kand. i Lund ’89, pro vår i Lund 91. E. lär. i Hälsingborg 92-01, lärov:adj. i Skara 00-08, därefter v. Gbgs’ latin, lär. v. Gbgs gymn. f. fl. fr. 11. Led. av stads-fullm. i Skara 07-08, sekr. i Gbgs lär:sällsk. 13-16, v. ordf. 20-22, ordf. i Gbgs adj :-fören. 19-21, led. av styr. f. Lärovilär. riksförb. 21-26. Skr.: åtsk. läroböcker i tyska o. latin, upps. o. rec. i pedag. tidskr. o. dagl. tidn. RVO 23.
translated: Bokelund, Nils Albert Julius, former high school teacher, Gothenburg, born on March 20, 1867 in Helsingborg to baker August B. and Amalia Nilsson. Married to Alma Olsson in 1892. - Graduated from high school 1885, earned a Bachelor's degree in Lund in 1889, and became a teaching assistant in Lund in 1891. He was a teacher in Helsingborg from 1892 to 1901, a high school teacher in Skara from 1900 to 1908, and later a Latin teacher at Gothenburg's grammar school from 1911. He was a member of the city council in Skara from 1907 to 1908, secretary of the Gothenburg Teacher's Society from 1913 to 1916, vice president from 1920 to 1922, chairman of the Gothenburg Teacher's Association from 1919 to 1921, and a member of the board of the National Association of Teachers from 1921 to 1926. He wrote several textbooks in German and Latin, as well as articles and reviews in educational journals and newspapers. He was awarded the Royal Order of Vasa in 1923.
